adHeader: Designer/Artist/Office Space on Napa River w/ View
adDetails: Unfurnished Studio/Office space shared with interior designer $1000 to $1500 a month depending on space requirements. Artists encouraged. On the Napa River with view. Shared conference area and kitchenette, includes utilities, internet and Alhambra water service. (Furniture in photos belongs to the most recent tenant, a graphic designer.) 10 x 15 raised office space of your own, with window view of river. See photo with blue wall. 12' ceilings over this space. With separate entrance and mailbox. 10 x 10 storage space in loft 16 x 20 Shared Space or your can rent additional space to make it your own. 15' to 18' ceilings overall.
